page.title: 12ADULT LEISURE IN MELBOURNE
page.content: ADULTS IN MELBOURNE HAVE MANY CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES THAT THEY CAN JOIN.THERE ARE 2 BOWLS CLUBS;SQUASH, BADMINTON,TENNIS AND VOLLEYBALL COURTS;2 THRIVING FOOTBALL CLUBS (MELBOURNE DYNAMOS AND MELBOURNE TOWN) AND A CRICKET CLUB WITH A JUNIOR SECTION. ON THE MORE RELAXED SIDE THERE ARE THE VARIOUS ROTARY ORGANISATIONS TO JOIN (ROTARY,INNER WHEEL AND ROTARACT),ALSO ROUND TABLE AND LADIES CIRCLE AND FINALLY PROBUS. THERE ARE 2 SOCIAL CLUBS IN THE TOWN - THE ROYAL BRITISH LEGION CLUB AND THE LIBERAL CLUB.THESE HAVE A VARIETY OF LEISURE ACTIVITIES FOR MEMBERS. FINALLY,THERE IS A SENIOR CITIZENS CLUB FOR RETIRED MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY.THIS IS IN CHURCH STREET AND CATERS FOR THEIR LEISURE TIME.
